short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows you the live cricket score and latest sports news.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Functionality of extension:
1.Real-Time Sports News and Cricket Updates: Sportify provides you with up-to-date news and real-time updates on cricket matches, ensuring you are always informed about the latest happenings in the sports world.

2.Thorough Match Details: With comprehensive match information at your fingertips, stay up to date on currently-running cricket matches. It gives you up-to-date information on everything from the venue to the inning scores and match status.

3.Recommended Sports Articles: It provides access to carefully chosen sports articles covering a wide range of topics in addition to live scores and match updates. The extension has you covered whether you're interested in player interviews, match analysis, or sporting events.

4.User-Friendly Interface: Sportify has a user-friendly interface. that makes it easy to use. You can quickly and easily find the information you need by visiting the extension.

5.Constant Updates: Sportify guarantees that you're always up to date on the newest happenings in sports. You can count on regular updates. It keeps you informed about any updates, new features, or better functionality.

6.For Fans of Sports and Cricket Enthusiasts: It meets your interests and offers useful information to improve your sports experience, whether you're a passionate cricket fan or just a sports lover in general.

7.Improved Sports Browsing: If you want to improve your sports browsing, Sportify is the tool to use. With this extension by your side, you can never miss a second of the action and be up to date on anything sports related.
